title: Enigma

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You will be assigned a random faction. This faction can be good or bad.

> You will be given an ability from 2 random roles. Once you use an ability, swap it for a random one. You do not pick the ability.

> Once per game you can reroll one or both abilities. They will be replaced with new abilities.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose you and your faction.

desc:
Post 1158
*"I'm sure this won't cause chaos if it is a good-aligned role."*
